src:
母親の交際相手、「かわいいので」４歳児にかみつく…全身に痕が十数か所

06 Nov 2019, 02:11

　交際相手の長男（４）にけがを負わせるなどしたとして、福岡県警西署は５日、住居不定、無職の男（２１）（傷害、暴行罪で起訴）を傷害と暴行の疑いで再逮捕した。
　発表によると、男は７月３１日～８月５日、交際相手の２０歳代女性が住む福岡市西区のマンションで、長男の腕などにかみつき、８月２１～２７日には長男の頭を殴ったり突き飛ばしたりして全治３日間のけがを負わせた疑い。長男は、かまれたような痕が全身に十数か所あった。男は「かわいいのでかみついてしまった」などと容疑を認めているという。
　男は長男を殴るなどしたとして、傷害などの疑いで９、１０月に逮捕され、１０月３１日に起訴された。
text:
Mother ’s companion, “Cute,” bites a 4-year-old child ... Dozens of marks on the whole body

06 Nov 2019, 02:11

On the 5th, the police officer in Fukuoka Prefecture arrested the unidentified and unemployed man (21) (proposed for injury and assault) for alleged injury and assault. .
According to the announcement, the man bites the eldest son's arm from July 31st to August 5th in an apartment in Nishi-ku, Fukuoka, where a female partner in his 20s lives. Suspected of being injured for 3 days in the entire cure by hitting or pushing away. The eldest son had dozens of scars throughout his body. The man said he was accused of “it was so cute that it was bitten”.
”The man was arrested in September and October on charges of injuries, etc., and was charged on October 31 because he had beaten his eldest son.
